meta.author: Anurag Jain & Arvind Ravulavaru
meta.tagline: A Simple Text based Adventure game written in Javascript
meta.welcome: Welcome to Maya - A pilot written to test the text based adventure game engine written in Javascript. The aim of the game is to find the exit gate and leave the maze.

room1.description: You're at the entrance of the zoo. Nothing seems to be happening out here. You better go inside in the zoo. Take the west or east path. (Hint : navigate around to explore [ex: `go north`])
room1.contextualHelp: I hear something in the Panda Exhibit

room2.description: You enter the Panda Exhibit. You notice a bent cage and are surprised to find only two panda cubs in the exhibit. One is missing! You observe bamboo and a pager near the cage.
room2.contextualHelp: I wonder where the pandas went...

actions.inspect: This might be useful when searching for the panda. The cub loves to eat bamboo.
Maybe I can use this pager to make contact other people.

room3.description: You find yourself in the large domed structure. You feel hot from the scorching air inside the exhibit. On the right you spot the senior zookeeper.

actions.talk to zookeeper: Oh heavens! I can't believe the cub escaped! What a terrible day. I lost my pocketbook and now this?!
actions.return pocketbook: Thank you! I've been looking for this!
actions.ask for passcode: Of course! Anything to retrive the missing panda cub. Here is the key.

room4.description: You enter the Aquarium. You observe different variety of colorful fish and other sea creatures. You notice an unattended camera near one of the tanks.

actions.inspect: It looks like the lens is broken. Probably useless now.

room5.description: You enter the Valley of the Gorillas. You observe ten gorillas inside the enclosure and a buff senior zookeeper in the exhibit.
room5.contextualHelp: Maybe the senior zookeeper saw something...

actions.talk to zookeeper: How's it going?... Missing panda? Woah, man... Let me know if you need anything.

actions.talk to: How's it going?... Missing panda? Woah, man... Let me know if you need anything.
